terms.title: Rental Terms
terms.docs: Required documents: passport, driver's license. International license is required for foreign citizens.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.paymentDesc: We accept Visa, MasterCard, and cash. The deposit depends on the car class and rental period. All deposit information will be provided before booking confirmation. The deposit is refunded within 1-3 business days after the car is returned without damage.
faq.termsDesc: Minimum driver age is 23, minimum driving experience is 3 years. Some premium cars may have higher requirements. Required documents: passport, driver's license. International license is required for foreign citizens. All cars are insured.
faq.returnDesc: The car must be returned at the time and place specified in the contract, with the same fuel level and clean. Return at another place or after hours is possible by prior arrangement and for an extra fee. We value your time and strive to make the return process as quick and convenient as possible.
faq.outOfCity: Can I travel outside the city/country?
faq.outOfCityDesc: Travel outside Almaty is possible by prior arrangement. For travel outside Kazakhstan, special conditions and rates apply, which must be clarified with our manager when booking. We will help you find the best option for your trip.

meta.title: TopCar - Premium Car Rental in Almaty
meta.description: Exclusive premium-class fleet in Almaty: elite cars, electric vehicles, luxury cars for tourists. VIP service, transfers, rental with and without driver.

home.title: Premium Car Rental in Almaty — TopCar Club
home.content:
TopCar Club offers exclusive luxury car rental in Almaty with impeccable 24/7 service. Our fleet includes luxury sedans, premium SUVs, and modern electric cars for tourists and business travelers.

We provide VIP car rental services with and without driver, airport transfers, event services, and individual solutions for each client. Transparent terms, competitive prices, and quality guarantee — choose TopCar Club for unforgettable trips around Kazakhstan.

autopark.title: Elite Cars and Electric Vehicles for Rent — TopCar Fleet
autopark.content:
Discover the TopCar Club elite car catalog — from luxury sedans to powerful SUVs and eco-friendly electric cars. Every vehicle in our fleet undergoes thorough inspection and regular maintenance.

Premium car rental in Almaty is available for both short-term trips and long-term use. Special offers for tourists, business trips, and ceremonial events. Book your perfect car today!

services.title: Professional Elite Car Rental Services in Almaty
services.content:
Comprehensive premium car rental services from TopCar Club include rental with personal driver, VIP airport transfers, business meeting services, and ceremonial event support.

Our professional drivers know the city like the back of their hand and ensure maximum comfort during your trip. Individual approach to each client, flexible rates, and 24/7 support — trust us to organize your perfect journey.

contacts.title: TopCar Club Contacts — Contact Us for Elite Car Rental
contacts.content:
The TopCar Club team works 24/7 for your convenience. Our office is located in the center of Almaty at 179/2 Baitursynov Street. We are always ready to answer your questions and help you choose the perfect car.

Contact us at +7 (777) 666-02-95, WhatsApp, or Telegram for quick booking. A personal manager will consult you on all matters of elite car and electric vehicle rental in Almaty.

terms.title: Elite Car Rental Terms — Transparent TopCar Rules
terms.content:
Learn about the elite car rental terms at TopCar Club. We work exclusively officially and provide full legal protection for our clients.

Minimum requirements: age from 23 years, driving experience from 3 years. All cars are insured and undergo regular maintenance. Flexible payment terms, transparent deposit system, and possibility of early car return.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy — TopCar Client Data Protection
privacy.content:
TopCar Club guarantees complete confidentiality of personal data of our clients. We use modern encryption technologies and strictly comply with the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

Your data is used exclusively to provide quality car rental service and is not transferred to third parties. Secure payments, protected document processing, and complete transparency in personal information usage.

download.title: TopCar Mobile App — Convenient Car Booking
download.content:
Download the TopCar Club mobile app for quick and convenient booking of elite cars in Almaty. The app is available for iOS and Android devices.

In the app, you can view available cars, compare prices, book cars for needed dates, and track order status. Exclusive discounts and special offers are available only to mobile app users.

security.title: Security and Reliability — TopCar Club Quality Guarantees
security.content:
Our clients' safety is our top priority. All TopCar Club vehicles undergo mandatory pre-trip inspection and regular maintenance at official dealers.

Comprehensive CASCO and OSAGO insurance, 24/7 roadside technical support, GPS monitoring for your safety. We work only with verified partners and guarantee the highest level of service.
